hm.binkley.util

Class ParameterizedHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • hm.binkley.util.ParameterizedHelper

  • public final class ParameterizedHelper
extends Object
    ParameterizedHelper assists in writing JUnit Parameterized tests.
    Author:
    B. K. Oxley (binkley)
    Pending:
    Move to hm.binkley.junit package, Rename to ParameterizedTestHelper

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  ParameterizedHelper.Key
      Tuple for defining INI section keys and how to map their values to test parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • parametersFrom

        @Nonnull
public static List<Object[]> parametersFrom(@Nonnull
                                                      org.ini4j.Ini ini,
                                                      ParameterizedHelper.Key... keys)
        Creates a list of parmeters for the Parameterized.Parameters static method.

        For each Object[] the first element is the section name. The remaining elements are supplied by each key in order formed by fetching the section value for the key and applying the value function. Missing keys in the INI produce a null value.

        For example use Parameterized like this: 

         @Parameters(name = "{index}: {0}")
 public static Collection<Object[]> parameters() {
     return ParameterizedHelper.parameters(new Ini(...),
             Key.of("a"), Key.of("b", BigDecimal::new));
 }
        JUnit will then include the INI section name in describing failed cases.

        Please read the documentation on INI configuration to control processing of the INI source. For example, the default Ini class respects escape sequences (e.g., "\t" for TAB); the Wini class does not.

        The name "parametersFrom" was choosen to aid static import.

        Parameters:
        ini - the INI file, never mising
        keys - the keys
        Returns:
        the parameters list, never missing
